commit.message:
reload1.c (update_eliminables): Unconditionally check if frame_pointer_needed has changed.

	* reload1.c (update_eliminables): Unconditionally check if
	frame_pointer_needed has changed.

From-SVN: r58627

files.patch:

+	frame_pointer_needed has changed.
